author: barnabemonnot
content: thanks for sharing! i have seen it yes, i think we discussed it here a couple weeks ago? some methodological points i don't really agree with. the "clipping" seems a bit arbitrary, MEV isn't really accounted for and there are data transformations that seem a bit strange (for instance, it is set `estimated_tip = diff if diff > 0 else 1` where `diff = median_price - geth_price`, but it seems to me `max(diff, 1)` would be more sensible in this context, otherwise when diff is between 0 and 1 it makes a weird discontinuity)

author: trent_vanepps
content: cool, just wanted to pass it along if you hadn't!

author: barnabemonnot
content: thanks! do you know if they are working on another analysis? i don't remember if this was an ongoing project

author: timbeiko
content: No it was a one off I believe
